# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-services-msb-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1077/org/openo/common-services/microservice-bus/msb-core-standalone/1.0.0-RC1/msb-core-standalone-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz && tar -xf common-services-msb-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f common-services-msb-1.0.0-RC1-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 80
EXPOSE 8080
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0-RC1 autorelease-1077 > OPENO_VERSION
